heading: Lights in the trees
text: As night falls, you spot some distant lights in the gathering gloom. Should you follow and investigate, or leave well alone?

choices.label: I must see what they are...
No good comes from being too curious...

heading: Rolling meadows
text: You have discovered a series of lush green fields, ready for you to explore and settle.

heading: Sandy coastline
text: You have discovered a sandy stretch of coast, too shallow for fishing.

heading: Sailing into the blue
text: Now you're in open water, the fish are more numerous.
